title: Google IT Support Certified
description: Competence in many basic skills, including problem solving and customer service, networking, operating systems, systems administration, and security.

title: Architecting GCE Certified
description: Deployed solution elements, including infrastructure components such as networks, systems and applications services using GCP, with a focus on Compute Engine.

title: Bangkit Academy Certified
description: Bangkit is a Google-led academy designed to produce high-caliber technical talent. Successfully completing Bangkit, specializing in Cloud Computing, graduated with Disctiction.

title: Website on Google Cloud Certified
description: Initiating services, set-up network and public ip, uploading resources via command-line, deploy lampp stack, configuring http server config file, and deploy site.
